name: electricity production, photovoltaic, 3kWp slanted-roof installation, single-Si, panel, mounted | electricity, low voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3223/documentation

This dataset represents the production of grid-connected low voltage electricity with a 3 kWp building integrated photovoltaic (PV) module in Switzerland in 2011. The 3 kWp module has been chosen as basic module for building integrated PV electricity production. Larger modules can easily be built with these 3 kWp modules without producing a significant error in environmental impact calculations. The module is a single-Si panel installed on a slanted roof.;An inverter is used to convert the low voltage DC power into AC power.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From the PV module installed and ready to be used.

Infrastructure for 3kWp PV-plant. Water use for cleaning. Amount of solar energy transformed to electricity. Waste heat emission due to losses of electricity in the system.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The annual production volume valid for 2011
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Electricity production with grid-connected photovoltaic power plants mounted on buildings slanted roof.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The simplifying assumption was made that all electricity is directly provided as low voltage electricity, so that no transformation has to take place. Even in countries with high shares of open ground installations (where medium or high voltage electricity might arrive at the busbar), the error introduced due to this assumption is not significant, as transformation processes do only have a low influence on environmental impacts.
